name: Metal Gear Noah
description:
Metal Gear Noah, the Game

Build an Ark before the Flood washes you away.
Chop and gather wood or produce and program bots to make it in time.
Bots have very limmited memory. Use it wisely, since software is producing data, besides it's constantly leaking.

Noah

WASD to move
Space to chop trees
F to drag them (drag them to the Ark)

Bots

Click to select bot
Drag and drop functions to install or remove
Keep track of bot's memory:
Remove red sequences (leaking bytes)
Gather yellow sequences (data) to produce more bots or upgrade software
